net.tridentsdk.server.chunk

Class ChunkLocationSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.server.chunk.ChunkLocationSet

  • public class ChunkLocationSet
extends Object
    The set of chunk locations and management methods for a player connected to the server
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChunkLocationSet(TridentPlayer player)
      Creates a new chunk set for the given player

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clean(int distance)
      Clears the chunks that are not used within the specified view distance
      void clean0(int viewDist) 
      void clear()
      Correctly clears and releases the chunk references held by this set
      Set<ChunkLocation> locations()
      Obtains the chunks that are held in this location set
      void update(int viewDistance)
      Updates the chunks the player does not currently have within the given view distance

    • Method Detail

      • clean

        public void clean(int distance)
        Clears the chunks that are not used within the specified view distance
        Parameters:
        distance - the distance of chunks of which to retain

      • clean0

        @Policy(value="holds knownChunks")
public void clean0(int viewDist)

      • update

        public void update(int viewDistance)
        Updates the chunks the player does not currently have within the given view distance
        Parameters:
        viewDistance - the diameter of the circle which to send chunks that the player currently does not possess as listed in this set

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Correctly clears and releases the chunk references held by this set

      • locations

        @Policy(value="holds knownChunks")
public Set<ChunkLocation> locations()
        Obtains the chunks that are held in this location set
        Returns:
        the raw location set
